com.turnout.ws.controller

Class PartyAuthMechController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.PartyAuthMechController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class PartyAuthMechController
extends java.lang.Object
    PartyAuthMechController class is front face for accessing and manipulating parties authentication related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template. This class allows the users to create new account, signin, change their passwords and ensuring their email trust worthy.

    • Method Detail

      • signUpUser

        @PermitAll
@Path(value="/signUp")
@POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject signUpUser(org.json.simple.JSONObject signUpReq)
                                      throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                             PartyExistException,
                                             PartyEmailValidateException,
                                             PartyDeviceNotFoundException,
                                             PartyNameValidateException
        This method used to sign up users. The users information will be store into database and send verification code to the respective user.
        Parameters:
        signUpReq - JSONObject contain information about the users.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of party id.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - Exception thrown when the message content empty.
        PartyExistException - Exception thrown when entered party is already exist in database.
        PartyEmailValidateException - Exception thrown when entered email id is not an usual format or when it may not be an valid email id.
        PartyDeviceNotFoundException - Exception thrown when the device type and token is empty.
        PartyNameValidateException - Exception thrown when entered party name is not valid or it may contain alpha numeric value.

      • verifyEmail

        @PermitAll
@Path(value="/verifyEmail")
@POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject verifyEmail(org.json.simple.JSONObject verifyReq)
                                       throws WrongVerifyCodeException,
                                              PartyEmailValidateException,
                                              PartyNotFoundException
        This method used to verify the user by checking the verification code.
        Parameters:
        verifyReq - JSONObject contain information about the verification code.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of success message.
        Throws:
        WrongVerifyCodeException - Exception thrown when temporary verification code does not match with user's entered code.
        PartyEmailValidateException - Exception thrown when entered email id is not an usual format or when it may not be an valid email id.
        PartyNotFoundException - Exception thrown when entered party is not found.

      • signInUser

        @PermitAll
@Path(value="/signIn")
@POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject signInUser(org.json.simple.JSONObject signUpReq)
                                      throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                             PartyExistException,
                                             PartyEmailValidateException,
                                             PartyDeviceNotFoundException
        This method used to sign in the users, User need to enter the auth id and password to sign in.
        Parameters:
        signUpReq - JSONObject contain information about the users details.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of party id.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - Exception thrown when the message is empty.
        PartyExistException - Exception thrown when entered party is already exist in database.
        PartyEmailValidateException - Exception thrown when entered email id is not an usual format or when it may not be an valid email id.
        PartyDeviceNotFoundException - Exception thrown when the device token and type is empty.

      • forgetPassword

        @PermitAll
@Path(value="/forgetPassword")
@POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject forgetPassword(org.json.simple.JSONObject fgetReq)
                                          throws PartyEmailValidateException
        This method used for forget password. If the user forgot their password they request forgot password option.
        Parameters:
        fgetReq - A JSONObject contains information of user email and type.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a success or error message.
        Throws:
        PartyEmailValidateException - Exception thrown when entered email id is not an usual format or when it may not be an valid email id.

      • resetPassword

        @PermitAll
@Path(value="/updatePassword")
@POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject resetPassword(org.json.simple.JSONObject resetReq)
                                         throws PartyEmailValidateException
        This method used to update new password, User needs to enter the received temporary password and need to enter new and confirm password.
        Parameters:
        resetReq - A JSONObject contains information of party new and old password.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a success or error message.
        Throws:
        PartyEmailValidateException - Exception thrown when entered email id is not an usual format or when it may not be an valid email id.

      • signUpInstagram

        @PermitAll
@Path(value="/instagramCode")
@POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject signUpInstagram(org.json.simple.JSONObject instReq)
                                           throws com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException,
                                                  WrongAccessTokenException,
                                                  PartyDeviceNotFoundException
        This method used to sign up the users through instagram. Instagram user details will be store into database. It will return party id of just inserted.
        Parameters:
        instReq - A JSONObject contains information of instagram user information.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of party id.
        Throws:
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException - Exception thrown when the http connection fails.
        WrongAccessTokenException - Exception thrown when entered access token of instagram is wrong or not a valid one.
        PartyDeviceNotFoundException - Exception thrown when device token and type is empty.
